actions.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Davis, Tom.
On agreeing to the Davis, Tom amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 36 - 390 (Roll no. 315).

description: Amendment sought to delete section 407 of the bill which requires that identification cards, uniforms, protective gear, and badges of Homeland Security personnel be manufactured in the United States.
purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-136 to remove section 407 of the bill, which requires that identification cards, uniforms, protective gear, and badges of Homeland Security personnel be manufactured in the United States.
